answerText: Limbo[10] Fallen angels are the guardians of this city in the Inferno. This city houses the Furies and Medusa, and it mosque-dominated neighborhoods contains the sixth through ninth circles.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Delaware + Michigan A  | 20 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: When Dante and Virgil arrive here, they encounter Saladin. For 10 points each: [10] Name this area of the Inferno that contains the classical poets as well as unbaptized children.
